alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Haralson; Polk (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 6:21PM EDT until June 25 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Haralson County in northwestern Georgia... Carroll County in northwestern Georgia... Polk County in northwestern Georgia... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 621 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Waco, or near Buchanan, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carrollton, Cedartown, Buchanan, Bremen, Temple, Rockmart, Tallapoosa, Bowdon, Mount Zion, Aragon, Whitesburg, Waco, Roopville, Esom Hill, Seaton Lake, Clem, Abilene, Draketown, John Tanner State Park and Blackjack Mountain. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
